usage_instructions.description: Optimized RAG parameters using high-quality models (gpt-4o + text-embedding-3-large)
integration_notes: Uses latest GPT-4o model for superior reasoning and accuracy
text-embedding-3-large provides highest quality embeddings (3072 dimensions)
Low temperature (0.0-0.1) ensures deterministic, accurate responses
Optimized chunk sizes and overlaps for best context retrieval
Ready for production deployment with premium model performance
